description: This file defines a Flutter widget named VintageBackground that provides a stylized background with optional vignette and paper grain effects, wrapping arbitrary child widgets.

classes.name: VintageBackground
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that renders a vintage-style background with optional vignette overlay, used to wrap page content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the VintageBackground, stacking background images and child widget with padding.
